oeoCBA.en: Please try again after installing a special item.
oeoCBA.es: Vuelve a intentarlo después de que hayas instalado un objeto especial.

ouoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
no words for noob!! i wouldn't allow my union for lower than level 40!

o+oCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Sorry, but I'm only speaking to anyone at least base level 40.
o+oCBA.pt: ^FF0000you can't receive reward. check your inventory and speak to me later.^000000
o+oCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Lo lamento, solo hablo con personas cuyo nivel de base sea 40.

pOoCBA.en: ^FF0000You can't receive reward with all those items in your inventory. Check your inventory and speak to me later.^000000
pOoCBA.pt: ^FF0000you are unable to talk. check your weight and speak to me later.^000000
pOoCBA.es: ^660000No puedes recibir recompensas con todos esos objetos en el inventario. Revisa el inventario y vuelve a hablarme más tarde.^000000

peoCBA.en: ^FF0000Check the weight of your gear and speak to me later.^000000
peoCBA.pt: - you can repeat this quest in 23 hours later.
peoCBA.es: ^660000Revisa el peso de tu equipo y vuelve a hablarme más tarde.^000000

puoCBA.en: - You can repeat this quest after 23 hours.
puoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
yet we need more material to hold Christmas for solos.

p+oCBA.en:
[Cliff]
We need more material to hold the Christmas Festival for the single people.
p+oCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
Bring ^FF000010 Stolen_Cookie, 10 Stolen_Candy and 10 Bag_Of_Selling_Goods^000000from god damn racoons!
p+oCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Necesitamos más materiales para celebrar el festival de Navidad para solteros.

qOoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Bring ^FF000010 Stolen Cookie, 10 Stolen Candy and 10 Bag Of Selling Goods^000000 from those annoying racoons!
qOoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
did you kick some asses of Racoon Whooray team? oh you've brought all festival items. we will be able to feel some christmas mood with them though we need more material!
qOoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡Trae ^66000010Galletas robadas, 10Caramelos robados y 10Bolsas de mercancías en venta^000000 que les saques a esos molestos mapaches!

qeoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Were you able to find any of those annoying Raccoons? Oh, you've brought all of the festival items.
We will be able to feel the Christmas mood soon with these things.
qeoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
i will take all those festival items you brought. for that, i will give you a exclusive reward only for solo union. you must open at home, alone!
qeoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¿Pudiste encontrar a alguno de esos molestos Mapaches? Oh, trajiste todos los objetos del festival.
Con estas cosas, pronto podremos sentir el clima navideño.

quoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Thanks for the items that you brought.
I'll give you a reward for your trouble.
quoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
Seize the festival!
Solo's christmas is now beginning! uhahahahaha!!
quoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Gracias por traer esos objetos.
Te daré una recompensa por las molestias.

q+oCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Seize the festival!
The Single Army's Christmas is now beginning! Hahahahaha!!
q+oCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
still you've got only {}point
interupt couples and collect more than 5 and come back!
q+oCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡Aprovecha el festival!
¡Comienza la Navidad del Ejército de solteros! ¡Ja, ja, ja, ja, ja!

rOoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
You only have {}points.
Interrupt couples and collect more than 5 points and come back!
rOoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
Yeah! you did it!! i can hear more and more of our troops!! hahaha, i'd say that it is our victory!!
rOoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Solo tienes {}puntos.
¡Interrumpe a las parejas, recolecta más de 5puntos y regresa!

reoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Nice, you did it! I can hear more and more of our troops! Victory to our union!
reoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
while we are being focused on couple breaking, darn racoon whoray team brats stole most of our festival items. we were not in good mood already..
reoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡Bien, lo lograste! ¡Cada vez escucho más y más a nuestras tropas! ¡Victoria para nuestro sindicato!

ruoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
While we're working on disrupting those snooty couples, there are thieving raccoons stealing our festival items.
As if being single wasn't already bad enough.
ruoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
now it is time to punish them and regain those festival items for solo's christmas party!!
ruoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Mientras trabajamos para interrumpir a esas parejas presumidas, hay mapaches ladrones que nos roban los objetos del festival.
Como si estar soltero no fuera ya lo suficientemente malo.

r+oCBA.en:
[Cliff]
We need to strike back at those thieves and get those festival items back fo the single's Christmas party!
r+oCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
^FF0000>10 Stolen_Cookie, 10 Stolen_Candy and 10 Bag_Of_Selling_Goods^000000 should be enough to have party. you can find them from racoons on every place.
r+oCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡Tenemos que contraatacar a esos ladrones y recuperar los objetos del festival para la fiesta de Navidad para solteros!

sOoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
^FF0000>10 Stolen Cookie, 10 Stolen Candy and 10 Bag Of Selling Goods^000000 should be enough to get back from the raccoons. You shouldn't have a problem finding them all over Rune Midgard.
sOoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
no matter how much you brought, i wil take them all, so do as you wish!!
sOoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
^660000>10Galletas robadas, 10Caramelos robados y 10Bolsas de mercancías^000000 deberían ser suficientes para vengarnos de los mapaches. No deberías tener problemas para encontrarlos a lo largo de Runa Midgard.

seoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Hey you! Yeah! Right there! You!
seoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
hey you!! yeah! right there! you!!

suoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
let me ask you one thing directly.
You're single right? Come on don't lie now!
suoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
let me ask you one thing directly.
You must be a solo. i've got a feeling. right?!??
suoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Déjame preguntarte algo de forma directa.
No tienes pareja, ¿cierto? Vamos, ¡no me mientas!

s+oCBA.en: So what if I am single?
s+oCBA.es: ¿Y cuál es el problema si no tengo pareja?

teoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
What? If you're not with us you're against us!
......
Taste my lonely wrath!
teoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
What? couple?! Ha! ......
......
here comes the anger of all solos!!!
teoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¿Qué? Si no estás con nosotros, ¡estás en nuestra contra!
......
¡Prueba mi ira solitaria!

tuoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Waahahahahah!
Iknew it the moment I saw you...
I was born single!
My name is Cliff!
tuoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
waahahahahah!
i knew it! i got it at glence!
i was born as a single!
My name is solo han.!
tuoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡Mua, ja, ja, ja, ja!
Lo supe en cuanto te vi…
¡Nací sin pareja!
¡Me llamo Cliff!

t+oCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Finally, this december, the day is coming....
t+oCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
finally, on this december, the day is coming....
t+oCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Al fin, este diciembre, se acerca la fecha…

uOoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Christmas songs everywhere on street, jingling lights, pure white snow, and couples seeing each other with smiles on their faces... couples...!
uOoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
christmas songs everywhere on street, jingling lights, puring white snow, and couples seeing each others with smile on face...couple...COUPLEEE... !!!!
uOoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Canciones navideñas en todas las calles, luces tintineantes, la nieve más blanca y parejas que se miran a los ojos sonriendo… ¡Parejas…!

ueoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Since when did Christmas become such a big date night? This is definitely messing with my single-life cool.
ueoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
from the beginning, it was a anniversary of Jesus and it was a holiday! then, why, how, when it became a day for a couple??
ueoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¿Desde cuándo la Navidad se convirtió en una gran noche de citas? Sin duda esto interfiere con mi tranquila vida de soltero.

uuoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
I can't overlook this....
Their happiness is really bothering me.
uuoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
i can't overlook this....
i can't forgive their happiness which is like girding at me!!
uuoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
No puedo pasarlo por alto…
Su felicidad me molesta mucho.

u+oCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Christmas for couples?
No way! This christmas will be a day for singles!
u+oCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
Christmas for couples?
No way! this christmas will be a day for solos!!
u+oCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¿Navidad para parejas?
¡De ninguna manera! ¡Esta Navidad será un día para los solteros!

vOoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
But, I need more troops to stand against them. So I started the Single's Union Army!
vOoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
however, i need more troops to stand against them. its name would be, Solo Union!!
vOoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Pero, necesito más tropas para resistir. ¡Por eso comencé el Ejército del sindicato de solteros!

veoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
What do you think? would you join to my union and make Christmas day special for single people with me?
veoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
What do you think? would you join to my solo union and make christmas day for solo with me?
veoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¿Qué te parece? ¿Te unirías a mi sindicato para hacer que la Navidad sea un día especial para los solteros?

weoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Yeah! that's it! But we need more single people to stand against those couples.
weoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
Yeah! that's it! but we need more solos to stand against couples.
weoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡Sí! ¡Eso es! Pero necesitamos más solteros para enfrentar a las parejas.

wuoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Here is your first mission!
Find some single people here in Lutie and make them join our union. Finding 5 of them should be enough, now gogogo~!
wuoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
here is your first mission!
go to find some solos on Lutie and make them join to us. 5 solos should be enough, now gogogo~!
wuoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡Esta es tu primera misión!
Encuentra gente soltera en Lutie y consigue que se unan a nuestro sindicato. Debería ser suficiente con que encuentres 5; ¡ahora, ve, ve, ve~!

w+oCBA.en:
[Cliff]
You have no time to waste!
Find 5 single people in this town and make them join our union!
w+oCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
we have no time to waste!
go to find 5 solos on this town and make them join!
w+oCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡No hay tiempo que perder!
¡Encuentra a 5solteros en esta ciudad y consigue que se unan a nuestro sindicato!

xOoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Good job! I've met all the candidates that you spoke to and I think they're all trustworthy.
xOoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
Good job! i've met them all who will share our will. all of them were trustworthy, hahaha!!
xOoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡Buen trabajo! Me reuní con todos los candidatos con los que hablaste y creo que son confiables.

xeoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
While you're gethering more union members, I've made our mark.
xeoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
while you're gethering more solo union members, i've made our mark..
xeoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Mientras reúnes más miembros para el sindicato, yo dejo nuestra huella.

xuoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
It might not be that useful but this kind of small sharing can make our solidarity stronger!
xuoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
it might not be useful but this kind of small sharing can make our solidarity more strong!
xuoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Quizás no sea tan útil, ¡pero este tipo de comunicación puede fortalecer nuestra solidaridad!

x+oCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Well, take this! Now you are the proud member of the Single Union Army!
x+oCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
well, take this! now you are the proud member of solo union!!
x+oCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Bueno, ¡toma! ¡Ahora eres miembro del Ejército del sindicato de solteros!

yOoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Now it's time to show what we're made of since we have enough in the union.
yOoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
now it is time to show our power to couples as we've got enough troops!!
yOoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Es hora de mostrar de lo que estamos hechos, ya que tenemos suficientes miembros en el sindicato.

yeoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Time for your second mission!
Find some couples here in Lutie and do whatever it takes to break them up!
yeoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
let's go for second mission!
go to Lutie and make couples separated. whatever they are just make them break up!!
yeoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
¡Es hora de tu segunda misión!
¡Encuentra algunas parejas de Lutie y haz todo lo posible para separarlas!

yuoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
Well there is one more thing...
when you disturb couples, if they break up, you will gain 2 points, and if they get into an argument you get 1 point.
yuoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
well there is one more thing...
when you disturb couple, if they broke up, you will gain 2 point, in case of just simple argument will grant you 1 point.
but if they become more into each others, your score will be minus 1 point. so when you got 5 points and come here for report, it means mission accomplished.
yuoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Bueno, hay algo más…
Cuando molestes a las parejas, si se separan, recibirás 2puntos y si comienzan a pelear recibirás 1punto.

y+oCBA.en:
[Cliff]
But, if they become more lovey-dovey after talking to you then you will lose 1 point. So when you've got 5 points come back to me.
y+oCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
surely you won't have minus score so don't worry.
y+oCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Pero si se ponen más melosos después de que hables con ellos, perderás 1punto. Regresa a verme cuando tengas 5puntos.

zOoCBA.en:
[Cliff]
I'm pretty sure that you won't have a negative score so don't worry.
zOoCBA.pt:
[Solo Han]
well there is one more thing...
when you disturb couple, if they broke up, you will gain 2 point, in case of just simple argument will grant you 1 point. 
but if they become more into each others, your score will be minus 1 point. so when you got 5 points and come here for report, it means mission accomplished.
zOoCBA.es:
[Cliff]
Confío que no tendrás un puntaje negativo, así que no te preocupes.

zuoCBA.en:
[Kwami]
Ha... breaking up right before Christmas... I'm single... single... AM I??!!
zuoCBA.pt:
[Kwami]
Haa..... breaking up right before Christmas....im solo...solo...AM I??!!
zuoCBA.es:
[Kwami]
Ja… Separarme justo antes de Navidad… Estoy soltero… Soltero… ¡¿NO?!

z+oCBA.en:
[Kwami]
Who are you!?
What's your business with me?
z+oCBA.pt:
[Kwami]
Who are you!?
What's your business with me?

0OoCBA.en: I represent the Single Union Army
0OoCBA.pt: - Solo Union has come to you
0OoCBA.es: Represento al Ejército del sindicato de solteros.

0eoCBA.en:
[Kwami]
Err? Single Union? What is that?
0eoCBA.pt:
[Kwami]
err? Solo Union? What is that?

1OoCBA.en:
[Kwami]
Since I'm single, I won't let couples enjoy this Christmas season!
1OoCBA.pt:
[Kwami]
as i am, Solo! i'd never let couples to enjoy this christmas!!
1OoCBA.es:
[Kwami]
Como estoy soltero, ¡no dejaré que las parejas disfruten de la temporada navideña!

1eoCBA.en:
[Kwami]
I will join to the Union!
1eoCBA.pt:
[Kwami]
I will join to the Union!!

1uoCBA.en: - Kwami has decided to become a member of Union.
1uoCBA.pt: - Kwami has become a member of Union.

1+oCBA.en:
[Kwami]
First thing's first, I'm going to get revenge on my ex for dumping me during Christmas...
1+oCBA.pt:
[Kwami]
first of all, i gotta go to revenge my ex.!
1+oCBA.es:
[Kwami]
Primero que nada, me voy a vengar de mi ex por dejarme durante Navidad…

2eoCBA.en:
[Willer]
Hmm... It's so boring up here alone on this roof...
2eoCBA.pt:
[Willer]
huaammm... now it is boring to play alone....
2eoCBA.es:
[Willer]
Mmm… Es muy aburrido estar solo en este techo…

2uoCBA.en:
[Willer]
Is there anything exciting?
Hey, you would you play with me?
2uoCBA.pt:
[Willer]
is there anything exciting?
...hey, you would you play with me??
2uoCBA.es:
[Willer]
¿No hay nada emocionante?
Hola, ¿quieres jugar conmigo?

2+oCBA.pt:
[Willer]
Solo what? why it has come to me?

3OoCBA.en:
[Willer]
Single what? What's it got to do with me?
3OoCBA.pt:
[Willer]
Sooo...
Bother couples and make christmas party only for solos?
3OoCBA.es:
[Willer]
¿Sindicato de qué? ¿Qué tiene que ver conmigo?

3eoCBA.pt:
[Willer]
that must be fun! dunno what is it exactly but i will join, i'm in!!

3uoCBA.en:
[Willer]
Sooo...
Bother couples so that we can have a Christmas party for us single people?
3uoCBA.pt: - Willer has become a member of Union.
3uoCBA.es:
[Willer]
Así que...
¿Molestar a las parejas para que podamos tener una fiesta de Navidad solo para nosotros, los solteros?

3+oCBA.en:
[Willer]
That must be fun! Dunno what is it exactly but I will join, I'm in!!
3+oCBA.pt:
[Willer]
i'm already excited to bother couples!!
3+oCBA.es:
[Willer]
¡Debe ser divertido! No sé bien qué es, pero me uniré, ¡acepto!

4OoCBA.en: Willer has become a member of the Union.

4eoCBA.en:
[Willer]
I'm already excited to bother couples and stop being bored!
4eoCBA.pt:
[Rinka]
ewww! darn... what kind of friend always boast about boy friend, what a disgusting! does she really think that i can't ?!?
4eoCBA.es:
[Willer]
¡Ya estoy entusiasmado por molestar a las parejas y dejar de aburrirme!

4+oCBA.en:
[Rinka]
Ewww! Darn... what kind of friend always boasts about having a boyfriend all the time? It's so disgusting! Does she really think that I can't have one too?!?
4+oCBA.pt:
[Rinka]
i can't... in fact there is no one.. i won't make it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
4+oCBA.es:
[Rinka]
¡Puaj! Maldición… ¿Qué clase de amiga alardea siempre sobre tener un novio? ¡Qué desagradable! ¡¿De verdad cree que no puedo tener uno?!

5OoCBA.pt:
[Rinka]
wuuuup! wow!!
what are you? what are you talking about, what is that!

5eoCBA.en:
[Rinka]
I can't... in fact there is no one. I won't make it!
5eoCBA.pt:
[Rinka]
hoho...was there something like that?
bothering couples...
Okay! let me in!
5eoCBA.es:
[Rinka]
No puedo… De hecho, no hay nadie. ¡No lo lograré!

5uoCBA.en:
[Rinka]
Wuuuup! wow!!
What are you? What are you talking about, what is that!
5uoCBA.pt:
[Rinka]
there must be more place for another?
...i will bring some more troop!
be there~ my friend!!...
5uoCBA.es:
[Rinka]
¡Ay! ¡Vaya!
¿Quién eres? ¡¿De qué estás hablando?! ¡¿Qué es eso?!

5+oCBA.pt: - Rinka has become a member of Union.

6OoCBA.en:
[Rinka]
Oh... something like that exists?
bothering couples...
Okay! let me in!
6OoCBA.pt:
[Rinka]
Wait there, my friend... you will... join soon!!
6OoCBA.es:
[Rinka]
Oh… ¿Existe algo así?
Molestar a las parejas…
¡Bueno! ¡Déjame unirme!

6eoCBA.en:
[Rinka]
There must be more place for other single peeps right?
I will bring some more troops!
Be there~ my friend!!...
6eoCBA.es:
[Rinka]
Tiene que haber más lugar para otros solteros, ¿no?
¡Traeré algunas tropas más!
¡Preséntate~, amigo…!

6uoCBA.en: - Rinka has become a member of the Union.

6+oCBA.en:
[Rinka]
Wait there, my friend... you will... join soon!!
6+oCBA.pt:
[Jee]
there will be no bothering. no one to take care of, no more extra works from other. will have more time to spend for themselves
6+oCBA.es:
[Rinka]
Espera un poco, amiguito… ¡Te unirás… pronto!

7OoCBA.pt:
[Jee]
why people are giving up this advantage and want to be a couple??

7eoCBA.en:
[Jee]
How beautiful it is to be single.
7eoCBA.pt:
[Jee]
yeah, i've heard of it recently. i knew that you would come to me.

7uoCBA.en:
[Jee]
No one bothering me and no one to take care of. I have all the time in the world to myself.
7uoCBA.pt:
[Jee]
no more word necessary. i will spread the advantage of being solo!
7uoCBA.es:
[Jee]
Nadie me molesta y no debo cuidar a nadie. Tengo todo el tiempo del mundo para mí.

7+oCBA.en:
[Jee]
Why people are giving up this advantage and want to be a part of a couple?
7+oCBA.pt: - Jee has become a member of Union.
7+oCBA.es:
[Jee]
¿Por qué la gente renuncia a esta ventaja y quiere formar parte de una pareja?

8OoCBA.en:
[Jee]
yeah, i've heard of it recently. i knew that you would come to me.
8OoCBA.pt:
[Jee]
i will spread the advantage of being solo.
8OoCBA.es:
[Jee]
Sí, he estado escuchando hablar de eso últimamente. Sabía que vendrías a verme.

8eoCBA.en:
[Jee]
no more word necessary. i will spread the advantage of being solo!
8eoCBA.es:
[Jee]
No hace falta que digas nada más. ¡Difundiré las ventajas de estar soltero!

8uoCBA.en: - Jee has become a member of Union.

8+oCBA.en:
[Jee]
i will spread the advantage of being single.

9uoCBA.pt: -...you may consider of him agreed to join.

9+oCBA.pt: - Marty has become a member of Union.

+uoCBA.en: -I guess you can consider him a member now...
+uoCBA.es: -Supongo que ya puedes considerarlo un miembro…-

++oCBA.en: - Marty has become a member of Union.

/uoCBA.pt:
- Oh, no, another couple!
- Even though they're just machines
- I cannot bear to see this!

/+oCBA.pt: - Run the machine to the full power

Ding ding ding dong ding ding ding dong Ding ding ding dong ding ding ding dong

AesCBA.pt:
[Slot machine]
Krrrrrrrrrr Dingding dong Krrrrrr Dingding Krrrrrrrrrrr ding Krrrrrrrrr

AusCBA.en:
- Oh, no, another couple!
- Even though they're just machines
- I cannot bear to see this!
AusCBA.pt:
- I 
- I think I broke them both!
- successfully broke up a couple!
- 2 Points for a good job!
AusCBA.es:
(Oh, no, ¡otra pareja!

LusCBA.pt:
[Poor Alchemist]
Actually, I have something to tell you.
It's very important so please listen carefully.

MOsCBA.pt:
[Poor Alchemist]
Biologically speaking, limbic system in the cerebrum enables us to be sociable, to communicate with people, to entertain etc.

MesCBA.en:
[Florist]
Hello, Mr. Alchemist.
Are you working today, too?
MesCBA.pt:
[Poor Alchemist]
So when you see a beautiful woman, the information such as her appearance, her scent, the tone of her voice etc. goes to the limbic area.

MusCBA.en:
[Poor Alchemist]
Actually, I have something to tell you.
It's very important so please listen carefully.
MusCBA.pt:
[Poor Alchemist]
The limbic system then evaluates the information, to see if this lady is friendly, agressive, or charming, etc.
MusCBA.es:
[Alquimista pobre]
De hecho, tengo algo que decirte.
Es muy importante, así que escucha con atención.

M+sCBA.pt:
[Poor Alchemist]
When the evaluation is done, the limbic system immediately begins to secrete the chemicals.

NOsCBA.en:
[Poor Alchemist]
Biologically speaking, limbic system in the cerebrum enables us to be sociable, to communicate with people, to entertain etc.
NOsCBA.pt:
[Poor Alchemist]
So if you're attracted to this lady, a hormone calls Dopamine is secreted and it makes you feel slightly happy.
NOsCBA.es:
[Alquimista pobre]
Desde el punto de vista biológico, el sistema límbico del cerebro nos permite socializar, comunicarnos con las personas, entretener, etc.

NesCBA.en:
[Poor Alchemist]
So when you see a beautiful woman, the information such as her appearance, her scent, the tone of her voice etc. goes to the limbic area.
NesCBA.pt:
[Poor Alchemist]
When that stage ends, you get the Adrenaline pumping, then you become more direct and enthusiastic.
NesCBA.es:
[Alquimista pobre]
Por eso, cuando vemos a una mujer hermosa, la información sobre su apariencia, su aroma, el tono de su voz, etc., va directo a la zona límbica.

NusCBA.en:
[Poor Alchemist]
The limbic system then evaluates the information, to see if this lady is friendly, agressive, or charming, etc.
NusCBA.pt:
[Poor Alchemist]
I am in that stage now, towards you! In other word, I am very...!!
NusCBA.es:
[Alquimista pobre]
Luego, el sistema límbico evalúa la información, para ver si esta señora es amigable, agresiva o encantadora, etc.

N+sCBA.en:
[Poor Alchemist]
When the evaluation is done, the limbic system immediately begins to secrete the chemicals.
N+sCBA.es:
[Alquimista pobre]
Cuando la evaluación termina, el sistema límbico comienza de inmediato a secretar los químicos.

OOsCBA.en:
